name: mojoconsole-plus
description: A web interface for executing command both in game and through browser.

name: GrasscuttersWebDashboard
description: Another web interface for executing command both in game and through browser

name: opencommand-plugin
description: A plugin that opens the GC command execution interface for third-party clients, only used by GrasscutterCommandGenerator at the moment, and allows it to execute command remotely.

name: GCAuth-OAuth
description: In-game login system for Grasscutter, based on oauth and GCAuth.

name: MeaNotice
description: A plugin of Grasscutter for send regular notice.

name: MeaMailPlus
description: A plugin of Grasscutter for send in-game mail conveniently

name: IdLookPlugin
description: A plugin of Grasscutter for lookup item IDs from the handbook

name: GCEnkaCopy
description: Copying characters, artifacts, weapon, and costume from official server and auto equpt them

name: GCGM
description: A web interface to monitor performance usage of GC server[partially updated]
